1 hour to #StarTrekHour, a weekly twitter hashtag party hosted by @JoeSondow. Special thanks @Native_Orchid @ArckAngel_X @christybell39 for writing this week's discussion questions! https://t.co/xGr2PZ2RE7
2 hours to #StarTrekHour! I'll tweet discussion questions about DS9 S5E22 “Children of Time”, you include the #StarTrekHour hashtag in your answers. Newcomers are welcome! https://t.co/xGr2PZ2RE7
@STvSW There isn't usually too much overlap. Spitballing works pretty well. All set for tonight, though. Thanks for asking!
We're all set now for #StarTrekHour questions. Thanks so much @Native_Orchid @ArckAngel_X @christybell39! See you all back here in 13 hours. https://t.co/xGr2PZksvF
